website_summaries.verdict: These stackable stools win out with their design and sturdy capacity.
pros: Comes as a set of four
Rubber feet to protect your floors
cons: Some customers also felt there was an odor when first out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color with cookie-cutter finish
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite happy with these stools - they're sturdy and solid! The color goes perfectly with my table and kitchen! My only complaint is that the "antiquing" is cookie-cutter; each stool bears the exact same pattern of "wear" and there's literally nothing to distinguish one stool from the other.
customer_reviews.author: Emopausal

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: They are great for what they are; functional, affordable and sturdy. I have no problems with them thus far. They look cool and match the beach them Ihave going and have a little industrial look. I'd buy them again if I had another bar area.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Powder Blue Color
customer_reviews.text: The bar stools I received are a deeper blue color than was pictured and what I would perceive as "powder blue" but I really like them ! They really add that splash of color I was looking for. They are well built, solid and sturdy. The weld areas are smooth and the rubber feet are well incorporated. I am very happy with the distressed look. It is very well done and I won't have any worries about wear and tear as it will just add to the awesomeness ! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Well built and they look great! Not to terribly comfy but we didnt expect ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built and they look great! Not to terribly comfy but we didnt expect that they would be. would recommend and buy again. Damn good communication from the company...probably the best on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I am very impressed with these bar stools. I have only had them for a short period but I can tell you they are made way better than what you find in discount furniture stores. "These legs will not bend on you and are not flimsy. Our original shipment had a dent in the top stool in the package. I notified Amazon and had a replacement in 2 days. I definitely recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bar stools
customer_reviews.text: These urban mod bar stools are perfect for my sofa bar table and the teal color adds the perfect amount of color. The sturdiness of them & beautiful distressed look are exactly what I was looking for. So happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These stools are so perfect! They can be colorful and are extremely sturdy. They were the perfect pop of color my kitchen and dining area needed!
customer_reviews.author: teacher3

customer_reviews.title: Story with fun pop of color
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and I like that it has the floor protection pads on the feet. I may need to order a seat pad for my husband but I have no issues with the comfort level for the short periods of time I use the stools. I purposely wanted stools that accommodated weights greater than 300 lbs. I would have like a more teal color but the blue color matches the online pictures. I like the pop of color the stools add to our kitchen. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Shown
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived a day early in a rectangle box. The chairs did not require any assembly (thank you for making my life easier) and were well-secured. They seem very sturdy, color identical to pics online, and look great in our kitchen. They also are significantly less than others similar to their style without losing quality. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price difference
customer_reviews.text: There are lower priced items similar to this stool set. We decided to trust the high Amazon rating of this item and have not been disappointed. It arrived with wrapping that showed meticulous care to the product, and we've been really enjoying the look and functionality of these stools. Given the opportunity, we might order another set. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Saturday Child

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Just received these. They look great and appear to be great quality and color
customer_reviews.author: Patricia  Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: good stools
customer_reviews.text: The light blue color in the listing is correct. Very nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very much worth the price. Probably one of the best items I've purchased from Amazon. Beautiful color, well made and extremely fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and cute! What was great no assembly required. Stacks well. However during the cold months, the seat gets really cold so you need to get one of those strap on cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Love these barstools...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has these barstools. I like them so much I ordered four from my house. They arrived in perfect condition. I like because they’re lightweight and can move easily.Most definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: lucille foster

customer_reviews.title: Great for the space
customer_reviews.text: I got a set of these stools for the island/bar in my new apartment. They are perfect for the small space, and the color brings a great pop to the room. They came shipping efficiently in one box, which I really appreciated since I have to move them a ways by myself. I also really like that they come with grip pads / no scratch pads on the bottom of the stools. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful stools at an unbeatable price. They look great at our kitchen island. I spend over an hour looking online at many stools since there are tons of other bands and on amazon, but I'm happy I went with this brand, because the quality is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: L.B.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Stools, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Love the stools. Perfect description and color looks amazing. Super fast shipping, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the stools and love the color! I’m so glad I took a chance and bought them! They're very sturdy, very stylish and bring a lot of freshness and personality to our kitchen! AND they stack which is helpful when I cleaned my floors! I highly recommend these stools and may purchase more for our outdoor living space when we start it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Skeldon

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Color!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had them long but so far so good. I don’t really think their made for comfort but it beats sitting on the floor🤣 So far we love them!

customer_reviews.title: They yellow
customer_reviews.text: I bought the distressed powder blue stools in August of 2018. They are beautiful but be advised that, unless they have changed their sealant, they DO yellow. I noticed around the one year mark. They are still great stools but I am disappointed with the staining.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size weight and color

customer_reviews.title: Just right height.
customer_reviews.text: These stools are perfect for sitting at the kitchen island in my new house. Very sturdy, but not too heavy to move around easily. They will fit in with both industrial and farmhouse styles.

customer_reviews.text: These are great stools! We got two sets of them and have been super happy with them. Highly recommend!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pop of Color!!!
customer_reviews.text: The barstools were a perfect match for my table. They are sturdy, easy to move around and the color gives a nice pop to my dining room!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: They have a good weight to them and I do not feel flimsy. I have sat on them and they have a nice solid feel which is what we we
customer_reviews.text: These tools were well constructed and perfectly decorated. They have a good weight to them and I do not feel flimsy. I have sat on them and they have a nice solid feel which is what we were looking for. I definitely would purchase these again and also give them as a gift.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought these stools for our Peninsula. They are very sturdy and stackable which is awesome for vacuuming. They don’t slide around which is very nice. The only complaint my kids had was in the morning they are cold to sit on LOL.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great value!

customer_reviews.title: Good value stools

They appear a bit paler blue in the pic and that was the color I was hoping for, but I don’t dislike them enough to send them back.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my outdoor kitchen bar
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful. Bright sunlight does make the chair appear a different color (a slight hint of green). In normal room lighting the bar stools are exactly as pictured. They are stable and very sturdy. Very pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE our new counter stools
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our new counter stools! Unfortunately, one of the stools did arrive with a big dent in the leg but we just keep that side up against the counter. It doesn't seem to affect the integrity & quality of the stool. They look awesome in our kitchen!! :)

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor, outdoor, bar stools.
customer_reviews.text: We loved everything about the bar stools that we purchased. They are beautiful and very solid. We love that they are stackable. The blue is a nice touch of color in our kitchen area. The affordable price was great too.

product_meta.title: UrbanMod 24 Inch Bar Stools for Kitchen Counter Height, Indoor Outdoor Metal, Set of 4, Powder Blue Distressed
feature_bullets: ✅PERFECT FOR KITCHEN OR OUTDOOR, HOME OR BUSINESS! LOVE THEM OR WE'LL SEND YOUR MONEY BACK! -Tired of wobbly stools that just look cheap? Ready for some modern, stable, sleek counter stools for your home or business? No more cheap, wobbly barstools!

✅THE ONLY SUPER DURABLE, MODERN, PERFECT-HEIGHT COUNTER STOOLS WITH A LIFETIME WARRANTY! -Most imitators are too short or don’t quite fit right! Those hold only 200 lbs, our holds up to 330 lbs…and safe for both inside and outside! These are perfect.

✅[SET OF 4] PERFECT FOR YOUR BAR/RESTAURANT (STACKABLE), AT HOME, OR YOUR GARAGE! NOTHING ELSE COMPARES -Don’t price shop; imitators are cheap & uncomfortable. You’re ready for your breakfast bar, kitchen, or shop to have sleek, strong stools, right?

✅READ BEFORE BUYING…MOST SELLERS DON’T WANT YOU KNOWING ABOUT THIS --> Other furniture stools looks great in the picture, yet are wobbly & unstable, will wear out, plus have no warranty (for a reason) if they don’t last. Bad idea to risk it with them?

✅HURRY BEFORE THESE PRIVATE, AMAZON-ONLY BONUSES EXPIRE -Lifetime Warranty comes FREE (89.65 value) BUY 3 SETS, GET 10% OFF (code below)! Haven’t you waited long enough? Don’t chance it with a cheap imitator, this investment makes sense.
